summary: THE COMPLAINT FOR THE FOLLOWING SEAT DOES NOT INVOLVE A CRASH, THIS IS A NOTE BY A CPS/PARENT USING THE SEAT.  GRACO HIGH BACK BOOSTER MODEL 8481, COVER DOES NOT STAY IN PLACE, WITH CLIPS AND ELASTIC PROVIDED, MAY LEAD PARENTS TO FEELING SECURE ABOUT POSITIONING OF SEAT BELT ON A CHILD.  HAVE ORIGINAL COVER AND REPLACEMENT THAT GRACO SENT.  THIS SEAT DOES BETTER IN A BUCKET TYPE SEAT AS OPPOSED TO A BENCH TYPE SEAT, BUT WE STILL HAVE THE SAME PROBLEM WITH A BUCKET TYPE SEAT.   *JB
